title: Clever Black - The Holland Family Saga Part Seven- No Room For M
description:
The Holland Family Saga Part Seven: No Room For Mercy by Clever Black



The Holland Family and their allies are gaining ground on the drug trade in the heart of the Midwest and West and all seems well. When a new player emerges onto the scene, however, the stakes are raised and the family business becomes more treacherous than one could imagine. The Holland Family and their allies soon find themselves entrenched in an all-out drug war that will leave a trail of carnage behind in its wake. The Holland Family Saga rolls on with Part Seven: No Room For Mercy. 
Whoever said crime doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t pay must have been dead brokeÃ¢â‚¬â€because those words are all but unfamiliar to the men and women who dare enter into this way of life. From city to city the members of various drug organizations fight for control of the profitable drug market in the heart of America. Many will go down, but who remains standing at the end of the day will be the only thing that matters in this battle of attrition that will play out on city streets.
Old Alliances are strengthened and new ones are formed as old and new characters alike emerge to drive the Holland Family Saga towards an epic climax that will only leave one with more questions to be answered once the dust settles. The road to riches is paved with many a sin, and not all are fortunate enough to reach the end, but those who dare to take on the journey understand fully that in order to rise to the top of the game, there must beÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.No Room For Mercy. 



Genre: Drama | Action
